plays.text: Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Holding Joe Thornton
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for Tripping P.J. Axelsson
Penalty to Mike Knuble 2 minutes for Tripping Jiri Fischer
Penalty to Rob Zamuner 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Mike Knuble 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Chelios
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Roughing Mike Knuble
Penalty to Joe Thornton 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Marty McInnis 2 minutes for Holding Chris Chelios
Penalty to Mike Knuble 2 minutes for High Sticking Kris Draper
Penalty to Mike Knuble 2 minutes for High Sticking Kris Draper
Goal scored by Joe Thornton assisted by Glen Murray
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Bryan Berard
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Bryan Berard
Penalty to Jozef Stumpel 2 minutes for High Sticking Nicklas Lidstrom
Goal scored by Nicklas Lidstrom assisted by Henrik Zetterberg and Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Boyd Devereaux 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Jonathan Girard
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for High Sticking Jozef Stumpel
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Chris Chelios
